sentences.en: An evaluating index system is established for degenerated estuarine ecosystem restoration.
sentences.cn: 摘要建立了退化河口生态系统恢复评价指标体系.

sentences.en: Coastal and estuarine swamps in warm climates are dominated by MANGROVES.
sentences.cn: 这些树木的存在使木本沼泽与普通沼泽相互区分.

sentences.en: Phenomenon of estuarine turbidity maximum zone is modeled by 2 - dimensional numerical model.
sentences.cn: 利用平面二维数值模型模拟河口最大浑浊带现象.

sentences.en: Sediment transport is an important component of estuarine and coastal engineering research.
sentences.cn: 河口、海岸带泥沙输移问题是河口海岸工程研究的重要组成内容.

sentences.en: The indexes of estuarine ecosystem environment can assess the effects of water regulation.
sentences.cn: 水量调度效果如何,河口生态环境变化状况是非常重要的衡量指标.

sentences.en: The third is to protect the estuarine environment and natural resources against pollution.
sentences.cn: 第三,河口和近海环境、生态和自然资源保护.

sentences.en: The water above the continental shelf is moved by the tides and by estuarine currents.
sentences.cn: 潮流和河口流使大陆架上的海水流动.

sentences.en: This is propably connected with estuarine environment and dynamic mechanisms.
sentences.cn: 分析认为这些现象与其河口的沉积环境和动力机制密切相关.
云南二)元阳哈尼人, 河口.

trans.tran_en: formed or deposited in an estuary
